explorer.fileNesting.patterns.package.json: package-lock.json, .editorconfig, .eslintrc.json, .gitignore, .prettierignore, .prettierrc, babel.config.json, jest.config.js, jest.preset.js, nx.json, workspace.json, tsconfig.base.json
explorer.fileNesting.patterns.project.json: tsconfig.*.json, .eslintrc.json, index.d.ts, jest.config.js, next-env.d.ts, next.config.js, tsconfig.json, cypress.json, .babelrc
